p: These previous interesting results stimulated the synthesis of several ferroquine derivatives, such as thiosemicarbazones, trioxaferroquines, ferrocene dual conjugates, hydroxyferroquines, and benzothiazoles (Wani et al. 2015; Adams et al. 2017). Thiosemicarbazones (TSCs) correspond to a very important class of compound for medicinal chemistry (Leovac et al. 2007), with interesting biological effects, including antimalarial activity (Bahl et al. 2010).
